title: Cem Deniz SAYINER Progress Journal
text:
Introduction






Setup To-Do



Here is the list of items to properly set this Progress Journal up.

Replace the name placeholder “[STUDENT NAME SURNAME / PROJECT GROUP NAME]” on index.qmd with your name or group name.
Replace the name placeholder “[STUDENT/GROUP NAME]” on _quarto.yml with your name or group name.
Replace the repository link https://github.com/pjournal/gh-pages-quarto-template with your or your group’s repository link.
If this is a group PJ, follow the instructions in comments on index.qmd and add members, group name, project name and project short description.
If this repository does not use RStudio/Posit, then you can also remove .Rproj file. Otherwise rename it with your repository name (e.g, mefXX-reponame).

Then test with quarto preview on Terminal. If everything is ok, execute quarto render command in Terminal.
Finally, delete the above section (including this sentence) and (GitHub) push the changes to your repository.



This progress journal covers Cem Deniz SAYINER’s work during their term at BDA 503 Fall 2023.
Each section is an assignment or an individual work.

title: 1  Assignment 1
text:
This is a template example qmd output page. You may see an example R code below.

set.seed(1)
vec1 <- sample(LETTERS,5)
paste0(vec1,collapse="")

[1] "YDGAB"

title: 1  Assignment 1
section: 1.1 1.Introduce yourself in one paragraph (Your name surname, your work, your data interests and how you (plan to) use data science skills in your current/future work). Add your Linkedin account link.
text:
1.1 1.Introduce yourself in one paragraph (Your name surname, your work, your data interests and how you (plan to) use data science skills in your current/future work). Add your Linkedin account link.

1.1.1 About me
Cem Deniz SAYINER, I have been working as a Senior R&D Engineer at ISBAK for 3 years. I possess 8 years of experience in software development, with the last 3 years focused on developing software for AI-Based Video Analytics Systems. I am enthusiastic about utilizing cutting-edge technology and open to new experiences in different fields that will help me expand my horizons.
To visit my LinkedIn Account

title: 1  Assignment 1
section: 1.2 2. Watch some demo and tutorial videos from Posit Youtube channel playlist and write one of them down on your Quarto document.
text:
1.2 2. Watch some demo and tutorial videos from Posit Youtube channel playlist and write one of them down on your Quarto document.

1.2.1 What is data wrangling? Intro, Motivation, Outline, Setup -- Pt. 1 Data Wrangling Introduction
Tutorial Videos Link

library(dplyr)


Attaching package: 'dplyr'


The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag


The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

  round(2)  %>%
